parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Fornication, whoredom; met: idolatry. From porneuo; harlotry; figuratively, idolatry.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
